trans-unit.source: Provides a wrapper for parsing and building paths to WMI objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.ManagementPath"></xref> class that is empty.
This is the default constructor.
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.ManagementPath"></xref> class for the given path.
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The object path.
Gets or sets the class portion of the path.
## Property Value A string containing the name of the class.
.NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Returns a <xref:System.String> value that holds the class portion of the path.
Returns a copy of the <xref href="System.Management.ManagementPath"></xref>.
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The cloned object.
Gets or sets the default scope path used when no scope is specified.
The default scope is \\\\.\root\cimv2, and can be changed by setting this property.
Returns a <xref href="System.Management.ManagementPath"></xref> that contains the default scope (namespace) path used when no scope is specified.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a class path.
## Property Value `true` if this is a class path; otherwise, `false`.
.NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value indicating whether this is a class path.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is an instance path.
## Property Value `true` if this is an instance path; otherwise, `false`.
.NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value indicating whether this is an instance path.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a *singleton* instance path.
## Property Value `true` if this is a singleton instance path; otherwise, `false`.
.NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value indicating whether this is a singleton instance path.
Gets or sets the namespace part of the path.
Note that this does not include the server name, which can be retrieved separately.
## Property Value A string containing the namespace portion of the path represented in this object.
.NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Returns a <xref:System.String> value containing the namespace part of the path.
Gets or sets the string representation of the full path in the object.
## Property Value A string containing the full path represented in this object.
.NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Returns a <xref:System.String> value containing the full path.
Gets or sets the relative path: class name and keys only.
## Property Value A string containing the relative path (not including the server and namespace portions) represented in this object.
.NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Returns a <xref:System.String> value containing the relative path.
Gets or sets the server part of the path.
## Property Value A string containing the server name from the path represented in this object.
.NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Returns a <xref:System.String> value containing the server name.
Sets the path as a new class path.
This means that the path must have a class name but not key values.
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Sets the path as a new *singleton* object path.
This means that it is a path to an instance but there are no key values.
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
A new object that is a copy of this instance.
Returns the full object path as the string representation.
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
A string containing the full object path represented by this object.
This value is equivalent to the value of the <xref:System.Management.ManagementPath.Path*> property.
